entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone McGonagall hasn't heard from lately. She is looking around the hall hoping he might appear.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: McGonagall is a person who is impatient and hasn't heard from Dumbledore lately. She is looking around the hall for him.

relationships.description: McGonagall hasn't heard from Dumbledore lately, which is why she is looking around the hall for him.
